synopsis.text: Sophie is a young woman working in a hat shop in the magical land of Ingary, where wizards and witches are real. The vain Witch of the Waste, jealous of Sophie's encounter with the wizard Howl, curses her to appear as an old woman. Seeking to break the curse, Sophie journeys to Howl's mysterious moving castle, befriending Calcifer, a powerful fire demon who powers the castle. Inside, she meets the self-indulgent Howl and his companions. Howl, able to see Sophie's true self, falls in love with her. To break the curse fully, Sophie must uncover the secret behind Calcifer's contract binding him to Howl. As war threatens Ingary, Sophie embarks on a dangerous adventure with Howl and his friends, hoping to return to her true self and help protect her homeland.
